column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I love spicy food
column2: so of course I had to try the spicy chicken ramen. The food came fast which was great
column3: but the food itself was pretty okay. One would probably need a bowl or two of ramen in order to be fully satisfied
column4: but this place is great for if you're trying to you're adventurous and into trying new foods. Furthermore
column6: the ambiance of this place is great. Would highly recommend for a date night in the Houston midtown area.
